root.name: Kumatanchi
root.description: OverviewKumatanchi is a life simulation game were the player must take care of a bear-girl named Kuma-tan who lives in a city zoo. The game was a co-production between Vanillaware and a doujin group named Ashinaga Ojisan. Shigatake, an artist at Vanillaware and a member of Ashinaga Ojisan, created the game's characters while the gameplay was modeled after a life sim previously released by the doujin group called Hanbanero-tan House. The sound company responsible for all of Vanillaware's previous soundtracks, Basiscape, also composed the music for the title. Kumatanchi was published for the Nintendo DS in Japan by Dimple Entertainment on September 25, 2008.
